extendedHelp: With a majority vote, the next player in the player-list will become the host.
Hosts can use this command to automatically change the host (without a vote).

createDescription: Creates a lobby in the current channel.

extendedHelp: After creating a game, players can join using `{{prefix}}join`, or by clicking the {{GREENTICK}} emoji.
When you have enough players, start playing using `{{prefix}}start`.

usesetupExtended.extendedHelp:
Do the default setups bore you? Use this command to create your own setup! Provide a list of roles (separated by commas) to use a custom setup.
Note: To start your game at night 1, use the --nightStart or -n flag.
usesetupExtended.reminder: Support for YAML setups is now deprecated, and will be removed in future updates.
